00036 #include <spectrum.h>
00037 
00038 // snapshot of current signal
00039 void snap_spectrum( SpecBlock * sb, int label )
00040 {
00041     int i,
00042         j;
00043 
00044     // where most recent signal started
00045     j = sb->fill;
00046 
00047     // copy starting from there in circular fashion,
00048     // applying window as we go
00049     if ( !sb->polyphase )
00050     {
00051         for ( i = 0; i < sb->size; i++ )
00052         {
00053             CXBdata( sb->timebuf, i ) =
00054                 Cscl( CXBdata( sb->accum, j ), sb->window[i] );
00055             j = ( ++j & sb->mask );
00056         }
00057     }
00058     else
00059     {
00060         int k;
00061 
00062         for ( i = 0; i < sb->size; i++ )
00063         {
00064             CXBreal( sb->timebuf, i ) =
00065                 CXBreal( sb->accum, j ) * sb->window[i];
00066             CXBimag( sb->timebuf, i ) =
00067                 CXBimag( sb->accum, j ) * sb->window[i];
00068             for ( k = 1; k < 8; k++ )
00069             {
00070                 int accumidx = ( j + k * sb->size ) & sb->mask,
00071                     winidx = i + k * sb->size;
00072 
00073                 CXBreal( sb->timebuf, i ) +=
00074                     CXBreal( sb->accum, accumidx ) * sb->window[winidx];
00075                 CXBimag( sb->timebuf, i ) +=
00076                     CXBimag( sb->accum, accumidx ) * sb->window[winidx];
00077             }
00078             j = ( ++j & sb->mask );
00079         }
00080 
00081     }
00082     sb->label = label;
00083     sb->last = SPEC_LAST_FREQ;
00084 }
00085 
00086 void snap_scope( SpecBlock * sb, int label )
00087 {
00088     int i,
00089         j;
00090 
00091     // where most recent signal started
00092     j = sb->fill;
00093 
00094     // copy starting from there in circular fashion
00095     for ( i = 0; i < sb->size; i++ )
00096     {
00097         sb->oscope[i] = CXBreal( sb->accum, j );
00098         j = ( ++j & sb->mask );
00099     }
00100 
00101     sb->label = label;
00102     sb->last = SPEC_LAST_TIME;
00103 }
00104 
00105 // snapshot -> frequency domain
00106 void compute_spectrum( SpecBlock * sb )
00107 {
00108     int i,
00109         j,
00110         half = sb->size / 2;
00111 
00112     // assume timebuf has windowed current snapshot
00113 
00114     fftwf_execute( sb->plan );
00115 
00116     if ( sb->scale == SPEC_MAG )
00117     {
00118         for ( i = 0, j = half; i < half; i++, j++ )
00119         {
00120             sb->output[i] = Cmag( CXBdata( sb->freqbuf, j ) );
00121             sb->output[j] = Cmag( CXBdata( sb->freqbuf, i ) );
00122         }
00123     }
00124     else
00125     {                           // SPEC_PWR
00126         for ( i = 0, j = half; i < half; i++, j++ )
00127         {
00128             sb->output[i] = Log10P( Csqrmag( CXBdata( sb->freqbuf, j ) ) );
00129             sb->output[j] = Log10P( Csqrmag( CXBdata( sb->freqbuf, i ) ) );
00130         }
00131     }
00132 }
00133 
00134 void init_spectrum( SpecBlock * sb )
00135 {
00136     sb->fill = 0;
00137     sb->accum = newCXB( sb->size * 16, 0, "spectrum accum" );
00138     sb->timebuf = newCXB( sb->size, 0, "spectrum timebuf" );
00139     sb->freqbuf = newCXB( sb->size, 0, "spectrum freqbuf" );
00140     sb->oscope = newvec_REAL( sb->size, "scope vec" );
00141     sb->window = newvec_REAL( sb->size * 16, "spectrum window" );
00142     makewindow( BLACKMANHARRIS_WINDOW, sb->size, sb->window );
00143     sb->mask = sb->size - 1;
00144     sb->polyphase = FALSE;
00145     sb->output =
00146         ( float * ) safealloc( sb->size, sizeof( float ), "spectrum output" );
00147     sb->plan =
00148         fftwf_plan_dft_1d( sb->size,
00149                            ( fftwf_complex * ) CXBbase( sb->timebuf ),
00150                            ( fftwf_complex * ) CXBbase( sb->freqbuf ),
00151                            FFTW_FORWARD, sb->planbits );
00152 }
00153 
00154 void reinit_spectrum( SpecBlock * sb )
00155 {
00156     size_t polysize = 1;
00157 
00158     sb->fill = 0;
00159     if ( sb->polyphase )
00160         polysize = 8;
00161     memset( ( char * ) CXBbase( sb->accum ), 0,
00162             polysize * sb->size * sizeof( REAL ) );
00163     memset( ( char * ) sb->output, 0, sb->size * sizeof( float ) );
00164 }
00165 
00166 void finish_spectrum( SpecBlock * sb )
00167 {
00168     if ( sb )
00169     {
00170         delCXB( sb->accum );
00171         delCXB( sb->timebuf );
00172         delCXB( sb->freqbuf );
00173         delvec_REAL( sb->oscope );
00174         delvec_REAL( sb->window );
00175         safefree( ( char * ) sb->output );
00176         fftwf_destroy_plan( sb->plan );
00177     }
00178 }
